summary: Comprehensive testing of REALUM new features - Day/Night cycle, NPCs, Dashboard widgets. All backend APIs working (14/14 tests passed). Frontend widgets displaying correctly with RLM rewards.

minor.issue: Rate limiting (429) after 20 requests per minute - expected security behavior

critical_code_review_comments: Day/Night cycle API returns correct period (morning/afternoon/evening/night) and is_day flag
NPCs API returns 6 NPCs with proper location mapping to REALUM zones
Objectives API returns objectives with RLM rewards (50, 75, 30, 10, 15, 20 RLM)
Seasonal Calendar has 26 events throughout the year with active/upcoming detection
Dashboard widgets properly fetch and display data from backend APIs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working: Day/Night cycle on 3D globe, NPC visualization, Dashboard widgets (Objectives, Mini-Tasks, Life Events, World Time). Rate limiting is active (20 req/min). No active seasonal events currently (next event: Valentine's Festival on Feb 14).
